content.detailedDescription:
Visto desde un edificio de 5 pisos, a las 7:30 pm
ovni azul brillante sobre el cerro de la sede central del banco bcp en la molina.
el objteto estaba sobre el cerro, era como una estrella o una luz de alguna antena. empezo a desplazarse lento hacia el norte hasta una distancia donde ya no estaba sobre el cerro, luego regreso en linea recta en direccion a su punto de partida y lo paso, acercandose mas al cerro coniguo.
minutos despues desaparecio...Por unos momento y volvio a aparecer y desaparecio finalmente.

este ovni ya se habia visto en este mismo punto antes de navidad, pero estatico.
content.summary: Blue ufo in la molina-lima-peru (above bcp bank)

content.detailedDescription:
This is old news.  i just found your site. 5 maybe 6 years ago i was in a vary remote part of wa state. i grew up in area and was familiar with area.
i saw 4 lights hovering over river and island in middle. lights could not be homes, campers, drugs. lights were over river and island and over treetops. (night) 
some ask am i missing time? am i? i don't know. i did spend at least 6 hours sleep--stranded in woods. 
i don't talk about it most think im nuts
no noise and no peeps---as far as i know
and yet i don't know
i saw what i saw!
content.summary: Lights unknown (4) hovering over river. no electric lines. in formation 3 ontop in line and 1 on right below 3. remote wa i thought was car(s). was not and may be missing time. no noise-none. car broke spent night in woods (in my car) left next day.

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i were returning to las vegas (where we are visiting family) after a weekend rock climbing trip.  we followed i-40w from flagstaff and had an uneventful (but gorgeous) drive through western arizona.  sometime after sunset and near the confluence of i-40w and 93, my high beams caught a grey, flying creature flapping large wings and ascending quickly out of view.  my first impression was that it could have been a large bird of prey, but i know of no native north american birds that would have as much surface area as this did.  it followed an upward diagonal trajectory, and appeared to be featherless and tailed.  i only saw it for 1-2 seconds.  i second-guessed my eyes and asked my partner if she had seen something, to which she responded; "you saw that too??"  i asked her what she had seen without telling her what i had; she also described a featherless, grey-skinned pterodactyl-like creature with a very long tail flying quickly upwards (though not straight upwards, on a horizontal upward trajectory).  we had been joking about seeing a ufo since we saw the uranus gas station and other ufo themed places on our way out, so it was surreal to see something neither of us could explain without sounding overhyped on the areas "vibrant" attractions.  my partner and i were not under the influence of anything, though i had a cup of coffee an hour beforehand if that counts for anything.
content.summary: Pterosaur/thunderbird-like creature sighted driving westbound on i-40w, arizona

content.detailedDescription: Took my dog outside before bed and was looking to the east and noticed the lights but they were not moving...I watched it for about 30 sec. and then it took off and then it moved behind some trees and was gone in a flash...
content.summary: Lights almost flashing but more like a pulse

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in backyard with girlfriend, saw a airplane looking light coming over the mountains on the horizon. the lights ascended for about 30 seconds, then all of a sudden the lights were completely gone. they disappeared.
content.summary: Lights over the horizon suddenly disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving down our main highway when my wife, a passenger in the car, noticed a bright light in the sky moving erratically and asked me what it was.  i then pulled off the highway and parked the car in a parking lot. a bright light was observed and i began to take video. i tried to describe the object that was moving in an unconventional manner thinking it was a model aircraft at first, but changed my mind later, because nobody flies models at night. i have been building and flying model planes and helicopters for over 50 yrs. and never saw anything like this object. 

the object was very bright, circular, changing brightness as it moved erratically about 30-40 degrees above the horizon. no noise of any type. no position, landing,or strobe lights noticed. the object would hover and move in sharp angular directions. the sky was clear, unrestricted visibility, and no wind. i tried to keep the tree line in the frame for reference.

the object descended behind the trees. i decided to drive two blocks to a known grassy field where i have flown models before to see if anyone was there. we arrived approx. 2 minutes later, but no one was in sight, leaving me to think that no models were flying.  i then called the palm sprigs airport control tower and asked them if they had any traffic visually or on approach control radar, and they reported "negative" on traffic in the area.

i hold a commercial flying lic. having over 50 years experience as a pilot flying helicopters and fixed wing aircraft. during this time,i have accumulated over 4000 hrs. flying as a naval aviator for 23yrs.,and was selected as co-pilot of swim i helicopter on the apollo 14 recovery team of allen shepard and crew. i continue flying today as a private pilot observing thousands of helicopters and fixed wing aircraft,and i never seen anything that performed maneuvers as this object performed.

my video is some what grainy due to my phone camera, but still gave a good presentation of the object, along with clear audio as i describe the object. my wife can be heard in the background. 

i hesitated to submit this report earlier due to others might make negative comments about this incident, but after trying to figure it out, i feel somebody else in the area saw what we saw and could explain what has happened. 

anyone from your organization can view the video in person from my computer and confirm my credentials, but i do not want to release it to the public at this time for copying. i assure you this is not a fraud.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have approx. 2 minutes of  good video during twilight hours. observed by two people while stopped in parking lot.

content.detailedDescription: i was at my computer.  around 9:45, i heard our dog barking outside.  i put her in the house and then proceeded to observe a few "interesting" lights in the sky with very weak binoculars.  i then decided to take some photos and went into the house to retrieve my camera.  i took a few pictures and then had to change batteries.  i went back outside and took a few more.  upon reviewing my photos, i discovered that one photo had at least 7 possible ufos in it. one was a blue orb; one a red orb; 2 were aqua-colored unusual objects but ones i had seen recently in other individuals' ufo pictures; one was a white orb with an additional rectangular section; one was composed of 2 white orbs so it may have been a cigar-shaped ufo; and one was a white zigzagged-looking object that may have been a chevron-shaped ufo. during my observation, the objects all seemed to be hovering or stationary. i did not see all these with my naked eye; they all became evident when i reviewed my photos inside after the event. the objects may still be out there in the southeastern sky, but it is too cold to remain outside.  i was a bit excited as the skies have been so dreary and cloudy lately, and i have not recently seen any unusual objects in the sky.
content.summary: Took a few nighttime photos.  one photo revealed at least 7 possible ufos.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside for a backyard astro-photo session and when i walked outside (i control the imaging and mount software from inside my house) i saw 2 red/orange glowing spheres hovering and moving in a west direction. at one point they stopped and were hovering and starting to pulse. i ran into my house to get my phone to video the event and came out and they were gone.
content.summary: 2 red/orange glowing spheres traveling east to west.

content.detailedDescription: Here's another of tonight's sunset...But maybe you could have your meteorologist take a look at it....There's the sunset...But in the distance..There's an orange glow...Could that possibly be a view of mars or another planet rarely seen by the naked eye ? ���
content.summary: Sighting

content.detailedDescription: While watching tv, noticed light in sky through closed sliding door. went outside with my wife and we both saw what was a very bright glowing red-orange flickering object in the north sky at approx. a 45 degree angle. no noise present. watched for about thirty seconds as it appeared to descend slightly. then went very dim, and moved faster in a nw direction until we lost sight due to trees. at first thought it might be some sort of flare, but it accelerated after going dim with no breeze present.
content.summary: Red-orange glowing ball

content.detailedDescription: On january 17 2014 i was in mauriceville texas at my uncles home getting ready to go hunting in waco.I was at the edge of his house near the porch but not on it handling the rifles and ice chest, everybody was inside talking except for me. it was very clear that night and since mauriceville is kind of rural there  wasnt light pollution so the stars were very beautiful, i live in the city so i took the opportunity to star gaze a little and it was as soon as i looked up that i saw this object. it was white in the middle with a blue tinge that gotta darker towards the edges. this thing was hauling ass and i mean it! i live near an airport so i know this wasnt a plane. it took about ten seconds to go through the entire sky on a straight path. after it was gone i had to stop and think and i just got this overwhelming feeling of awe and beauty. i know what i saw. i haven't told anyone else about it. im 16 years old and i will take this to my grave. my grandfather saw a ufo back in the 80s in winnie texas, he never even talks about it. all i know is that life will be different because i will have to bear the burden of this forever and i don't want to talk because down here in the bible belt people are quick to judge. please do your best to find more witnesses in the area because i have to know more about this and see if other people experienced what i did that night.
content.summary: Blue-white orb traveled straight with no sound

content.detailedDescription: I photographed these pictures the night of january 18th 20014, in sweeny tx.  i have been seeing this light for a while (about a year) and just dismissed it as a planet or star. when seen, it has always been east of my location, however, for the first time last night it was due south of me. while looking at it with the naked eye it appears to move.  the photo captures the movement of the light.  recently i���ve noticed a second but smaller light and, as such, have become more curious about what this may be. on clear nights the lights can be seen most nights.  does anyone have an explanation of what this is or has there been additional observations made of this phenomenon?
content.summary: Flashing white, blue, red, and green lights that tends to have irratic movement.

content.detailedDescription:
Okay, once again i'm here. and once again i am hard-up for full time req'd to describe this event.

please see jan 17, 2014 event already reported. this is a continuation of that event (24+ hours long). no nighttime viewing in order to 'confirm' that the objects never left, but they were still here yesterday... and more of them. one main object, many secondary objects....

i had a trip scheduled for jan 18, yet all got pushed back due to what i saw and furthermore captured on 'film'. i promise to offer more details at a later time. but for now, i offer pics of what i captured on jan 17 and jan 18 here right above the ucla/los angeles area. 

i do not know what is going on.... but jan 17 marked the 2nd time that i saw the same thing that i saw back in nov 2013 (reported). same place, same thing. only this time, it was here for 2 days. and this time, i've proof of what i saw, including this time secondary objects that i saw come 'from' the main object.

unsure what to think, but i'm truly starting to wonder that if something playing around directly above my head (and ucla) does not want to 'interact' with us here on earth, that perhaps we really should be afraid of just what they are. 

i do promise to update fully, but for now i really would like to take my birthday trip (even if 2 days late). so for now.... a brief description above and pics to document all of the last 2 days. 

i've got 10 pics to upload... here's to them actually making it up. i've actually got 'gobbs more' but these are the ones that 'count'.

for those of you in the los angeles area, please keep your eyes to the sky towards the ucla area.... look high high up and survey slowly. i would love to hear of others in the area who just might have seen what i have the last 2 days. think reflective, shiny and h-i-g-h up. however with binocs, you'll def notice more that what meets the eye. you must scan high and slow though in order to capture sight of what appears to be a white 'something' that is extremely reflective at times(the sun just bounces off this thing). 

yesterday, day 2 of the same sighting.... 'they' were much higher up than the day before. but day 2 offered even more than day 1 --- for day 2 glimpses thru binocs captured secondary 'things' coming from the 'main object'. what appeared to be 'box kite' objects actually 'came' from the 'main' object. all objects were stay stationary at times, or roll and tumble around, but never without a lack of direction. while the clouds blew east, the objects seen did not blow east. they would wobble at times a short distance, they would disappear and then reappear. and the strangest thing is: what i saw with the naked eye and binoculars appeared to much more that only the pictures would prove. the secondary objects appear to be numerous... very numerous. while i saw a red and white secondary object come from the main object... apparently there were many many more. i swear to god folk, i know what i saw, and something is going on here. 

might it be something at ucla? 
might it be something associated with sfo's known to use the ocean channel here between the coastline here and catalina?

with that said, tally ho for now, i must prep for my postponed trip... with a promise to be back and update fully in the 'comment section" of this report :)

ps: my 3rd attempt to upload my report mufon!!!!!I mufon --- you need to delay your 'time-out' for those of us with just under your 2mb limit). who wants a scraggly artifacted jpg file that looks like crap!? no, most of us want a decent pic to look at if we've come here for a means to an end!! that said, it usually takes perhaps 3-5 minutes for someone to 'describe' their 'moment'.... so yes mufon ---- increase your time-out sessions..... we do not want to start over again with our reports 3-4 times!!!

the last 5 photos had to be uploaded into the "comments" section..... sorry, but mufon kept timing out on me. i can only hope that the first 5 actually uploaded though. if not, they too will be found just below in the "comments" section. sorry folks, just trying to work with the site.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Jan17-18,24hrlongevent,uclaarea,updatingjan17report+newjan18sighting-picsthistimeuploaded. 24hrevent,possagaintoday,still2look. sameobjects,sameplace

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend, at the time,& i had come in from a party, & were laying down. it was about 2a.M. 6 glowing, yellow & orange orbs came in my window in a straight line. they were the size of a grapefruit. when they came in, they formed a circle and were bouncing up and down, still in a circle. while every other orbs were up, the others were down. they circled around about 2 or three times, then left in a straight line. the exact same way they came in. i asked my boyfriend if he had seen it, thinking i was seeing things. he said,"yes, i saw it, but i was drinking. you don't drink, and you saw it?" i answered yes, but have stayed puzzled all of these years.
content.summary: About 5 or 6 orbs, came in thru window bounced around over me then left

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on rt 3  west approaching giants stadium about 10 oclock in the morning.   i was in traffic but noticed something odd in the lower sky.     i knew i would not be able to concentrate on what it was so i got my i phone ready and took a blind photo towards the object thru my windshield. 
as i passed and had a moment to look, i saw a big military type helicopter in the sky thru my skylight  and then assumed that this was what the object must have been.  so i never looked at the photo assuming it was something explainable.
however, while looking thru my photos today i came to that photo for the first time and i am at a loss to explain what is on the image.   if anything, i thought it would be the large helicopter.

the only explanation i can give this is something on my windshield, however, i did not have a mark, a chip or any kind of mark on my windshield and if the i phone camera had that short a focus, the rest of the windshield marks and dirt etc would be in focus and noticeable  and the signs in the distance would be more distorted than in this photo.

and then what of the object in the sky?  this would have to be included in the photo even if my window had a mark on it..
im sure i captured the object thru the window. 
therefor this has to be the object i saw in the sky.
content.summary: Saw something sitting in the sky at a distance while driving. as i approached, i got my cell phone ready and took a blind photo of the object

content.detailedDescription:
I was up in my room and my room mate was on the main floor both of us were on the web. web sat went down,i clicked over to desktop,while room mate went out onto lania. suddenly he came rushing back in up to my room wanting my spotting scope.Pointed out my window as to what he was in question of. i to
was what ? we both went down to lower lanai to observe.We remained calm,questioning one another and ourselves that these two looking star like objects were sats'. but then way to bright,way to low and not moving,both held pulsating,one much more then the other,in the spotting scope not a clear picture of shape could be made out,seemingly again as if stars.No we were becoming more convinced of sphere shape.Scope fine focused in to give this to us and the lighting flash,colors began to really go off on the one.
then,died down, a fainter ball of light released from this one then as quick just gone,but moment later flash bright above the second one and so fast and bright could not tell if entered it it had ejected one. then nothing but steady less bright pulsing from both,remaining in hover. we just observed
about 20 minutes. they remained in direct line off horizon 30o 2 to 3 miles out between our home and town,which is 6.5 miles east.These we were very convinced were not stars,way to low,not sats'. then out over the ocean,and we have a fantastic view of channel running from kahalui,maui and big island
we sit on the furthest eastern point of the island.A low light movement at first on reg. jet path coming from ogg airport.Moving low like real flight path of jet. i tell room mate jet,i've observed many times this one,it shows like the basic wing lights,front under cockpit light,but then its' not climbing,the lights are flashing but man they are above normal bright. this is a beautifully clear maui night,quiet clear stars, and beginnings of fuller moon rising.We observe object moving not as slow as a jet,but not like super fast either.This observation is perhaps 2 min,a bit more,i'm like waiting for it to ascend or smaller plane coming in to local airport.Which we can clearly see with naked eye from our porch,about 5 miles on ocean away.
but then,neither happens, suddenly its' just gone,maybe but 5sec.Then we observe it again. this time its coming straight towards us.Same speed,smooth and steady and low.Maybe 4000' up,1 or 1.5 mile out,the
content.summary: Two spheres,hovering defined line of distance between,exchange of smaller sphere to the other then full ship direct line of sight arriving off ocean straight line above heads moving towards haliakula observatory here on maui

content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling north up a small hill in my city and noticed what i first thought was a small helicopter to the west of me. it was roughly 300 feet above the bow river and was moving slowly from west to east following the river. i dismissed the idea of it being a helicopter because it appeared like there was air turbulence around it. i then thought it might be a large black garbage bag that had been caught up in a wind vortex. however, because it appeared to change shape i stopped my car and walked over to the river bank which was roughly 100 feet above the river and observed a craft moving slowly towards me. it came right overhead, between 100 - 150 above me moving slowly and moved to to the se of my position gradually gaining altitude and finally stopped in the air and remained in that same position all the while that i observed it. i estimate it stopped at roughly 1500 feet. i had the feeling that it was waiting for me to leave which i finally did about 20 minutes later. it remained stationary in that position during the whole time i was observing it. if i had to estimate the distance from me at that time i would say about 1000 feet. 

i managed to take a picture on my cell phone. as stated it was dead quiet but, the air around it seemed to be boiling and slowly circulating around the craft. it was this movement of air that seemed to make the craft change shape when it was further away from me but, as it came closer i could clearly see it was a flying object. 

our city had a major flood a few weeks earlier and from what i observed, plus the appendages attached to this craft, it appeared the craft was mapping the river and the river valley. it seemed to know that i had spotted it and moved away until i left. 

it was clear to me that whatever was powering this craft, was not a jet or prop driven vehicle and was employing some kind of magnetic or anti-gravity device. 

i transferred the picture to my asus tablet and was able to do some minor editing to zoom in and get a bigger picture to see the shape of the craft. i noticed on one of the editing tools that i think produced a negative effect that there was a light halo around the vehicle which was what i observed. the best way to describe this aura was that it looked like the heat waves coming off a highway in the summer.
content.summary: Noted object with unusual aura, obseved it passing directly overhead, shrouded in what lloked like boiling air and moved slowly and silently

content.detailedDescription:
Upon walking back home tonight from brighton's laines, i was in my street, and i looked up at the sky to see how lovely the sunset looked. to my surprise, i saw what i thought was a bright star and i thought it might be venus....Until it started moving to the left, then right, and it kept doing this. i watched for about 5 minutes, and then a passer-by and his young son saw me looking up and i said, "oh look, i think that's the international space station!" they too were amazed and we all watched for about another 3 to 4 minutes, and we lightheartedly started talking about how nice it would be to go to an observatory. 

the sighting was very close to a cloud, and it disappeared behind the cloud, so i stopped looking up and carried on walking home. 

as i had kind of convinced myself that it must be the iss, it didn't really make me feel too surprised or shocked, until a friend of mine on facebook told me that the iss did its rounds in brighton early this morning. he then posted me your link...And here i am!
content.summary: Looked up, saw "star", but kept moving sideways in both directions for 10 mins

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the fields walking the dogs, came out of some trees into an open space on a hilltop with a good view of surrounding area, saw a black rectangular object just hovering, no noise, thought maybe it was a helicopter but it wasn't , stayed there for a while and then started moving it changed direction from roughly nw to w. it wasn't until i slipped on and looked down , looked back up and saw the object was no where to be seen.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Rectangular black object about the size of a chinook

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to a doll show, which was being held at a church in morah, mn. i had decided that i would go down the night before, as i needed to set the show set up early in the morning. 
i was driving a one-ton van. the night was warm - august. i don't really remember if it was cloudy or clear, but it must have been cloudy, as evidenced by what follows. 
as i drove, i noticed a sign that said, morah 16 miles. it may have been 12 miles or 18 miles, but something like that. this prompted me to look at the clock on the dash. it was about 2:15 am. i remember thinking, "good. i will be there in time to get a few hours' sleep." 
i noticed that the sky lightened in the distance, and i thought, "good. rain coming. people won't be able to work in their yards and gardens, which will make them more likely to attend the show." from my experience, snow keeps people from a show, while rain increases attendance.
a minute or so later the sky lightened (lightning) very near me, and i saw the sphere above me. it was probably about 12 - 20 feet off the ground, which made it very near my windshield - maybe 3-6 feet. it was huge, flat gray, no visible features. it is hard to estimate size, as it was so close to me that i could not tell where it started or ended. it was just a big ball, moving down the highway with me at extremely close range. 
i was quite excited. i thought that i would pull over, so i slowed down, applied the brake, and began to pull off onto the shoulder, but then i got scared and pulled back out onto the highway. i went on to the show and arrived there about 4 am, or later, in the morning. i am a bit confused about the exact time, but i am sure of the time of the sighting - 2:15 am. the time when i arrived in morah, approximately 15 miles away, was a lot later than it should have been. 
strangely, i don't remember the thing leaving, or lifting off, or disappearing. i just drove on. a weird coincidence was that a womon who set up directly across from me at the show was a member of nebraska's mufon, and was selling klingon dolls. she talked a lot about ufo's and i am sorry now, that i did not tell her about the sighting. i was afraid that she would think i was making it up.
content.summary: Observed a sphere directly above my vehicle as i drove. it hovered over and moved with me down the highway.

content.detailedDescription: On january 18, 2014, my son and i took a drive down the coast in carlsbad, california, a few miles from my home. it was around 1:00 am when we pulled over by the beach and were talking and watching the waves. at 1:45 am we saw a large, amber-orange, glowing object. it appeared to come from somewhere right on the beach less than a mile from where we were sitting, getting our attention by its size and brightness. the object ascended in an arc, westward over the ocean, then continued its ascension on a straight path west. at its closest,when we first saw it, it was big enough to cover a penny held out at arm's length. at its furthest, when it was further out over the ocean, it was the size of a pin-head held out at arm's length. it's ascension was extremely smooth and quick. when it reached its highest and furthest point, it hovered momentarily, zig-zagged four times, then stood perfectly still for several seconds. the object then headed back toward the beach, descending in a straight line but at an angle towards the water. it kept the same path and quickly got close enough to the ocean for us to see the orange glow reflecting off of the water, then close enough to have landed on the water. but instead of landing, it kept going, straight into the ocean, then it was gone and we didn't see anything more. the duration of the entire sighting was just over one minute and there was no sound at all. we were amazed and stayed there, watching the spot where it had submerged, seeing if it would come back to the surface or affect the surrounding water in any way, but nothing more happened and we left after fifteen more minutes had elapsed. all we could do was stare at each other and then back at the water. on the way home, we tried to come up with different aerial vehicles that we know of that it could have been, but couldn't think of any. i have lived on or near air bases for most of my life and am quite familiar with all kinds of fighter jets, cargo jets, different types of helicopters, etc. and this was nothing like anything i have ever seen or known of. i am very intrigued and would like to know what it was that we saw and if there are more of them.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The object ascended in an arc, flew straight out over the ocean, zig-zagged, hovered, then descended at an angle until submerged underwater.

content.detailedDescription:
I���m doubtful about all things connected with ufo���s, so i���m in no way cheerful of adding my recollection to, what is most likely, a collection of narcissistic attention seeking esoteric fantasy stories.   therefore i���ve been hesitant of submitting anything anywhere of what i saw 15 years ago. i���m not one to imagine things or even believe in things that can���t be explained, but it hasn���t let me go.
i was standing at the second story window of my parents��� house looking outside deciding whether to enjoy the cool air or smoke a cigarette. when i saw this odd rectangular shape moving in the sky. i was facing north and its course was nw to se. it was maybe 10 to 15 feet away and i was looking at it at a 15 degree angle. it was dark grey set against a darker blue grayish sky. i thought at first maybe i had looked into a light and it was just an afterimage on my retina. so i closed my eyes to see if i still saw it. no. i opened my eyes and there it was moving slowly across the sky. i focused my eyes both to the right and left of it. i didn���t change shape or alter its speed and its speed was really odd. i was moving far too slow to stay airborne. it had no wings, no propulsion system i could see no features of any kind simply a door shaped dark grey object, about the size of a car. it also seemed two dimensional even at an angle i could see no height of it. it passed me and flew over the house. so i rushed down the stairs out of the back door and true to its speed and course i saw it again. for a moment i considered to throw a rock at it. yet i quickly reconsidered due to the fact i was standing in a residential area plus the irony of throwing rocks at something i couldn���t identify didn���t escape me. so i gave it a smile and a wave instead. i tracked its course over the fence over the neighbors��� house until it was indistinguishable against the night sky.
content.summary: Seemed to be a two dimensional rectangular object with width and length but no distinguishable height; no wings, no emissions; about the size of a car

content.detailedDescription: My son was playing in the swimminpool in the villa of our neighbour, his friend was taking a video about his jump by a old generation mobile and for few seconds, just behind my son body, you can see an object crossing the the video very quickly.
content.summary: Object crossing the video

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was on the south side of taos new mexico, in llano quemado with my girlfriend. we were having a dispute about something i cannot recall, outside on the porch. 

2) we observed a very bright light emerge from the top of picuris peak to the southwest of us, and move slowly and soundlessly towards the sangre de cristo mountain range to the southeast of us. we noticed it because it was very bright and was definitely not an aircraft, it looked more like a star. there was nothing that appeared metallic about it, it did not blink, it did not make sound, it just hovered very slowly and emanated a red glow.

3) we didn't think much about what it was, it was so surreal and out of the ordinary we just stopped arguing completely and watched silently. speculation later as to what it could be led us to numerous possibilities but we were unable to come up with a legitimate explanation. 

4) it looked like pure light and there's no point of reference for me to identify it. it was just a flying red star-like orb that appeared to come out of the mountain, it's just not something you see everyday.

5) feelings were, the best i could describe a form of awe and confusion, knowing my mind could not wrap around what it was i was seeing. 

6) we lost sight of the object as it passed over the mountain range. we went back inside for a few minutes to discuss what we had seen when the entire house began to shake and the loudest rumble sounds i have ever heard. running back outside we saw jets, helicopters, and a very large helicopter (the source of the deafening sound) that flew right over our house in the direction of the orb. the large heli appeared to have two or three blades, maybe more, and almost looked rectangular. i had never seen such an aircraft before or heard a helicopter that loud, and assumed they were pursuing the orb-like object.

i have yet to identify what it was we saw. if the military was chasing it, as it appeared to be very urgent to them, i can only assume it was a foreign craft or object that was invading us airspace. it could also be something else entirely. this has been one of the most significant events of my life because of how surreal and intense it was, and because we still have no idea what we'd witnessed.
content.summary: Observed a bright red light emerge from mountain top, then move se over mountain. unfamiliar and extremely loud helicopters followed, about three minutes after.

content.detailedDescription: On january 18, 2014 at approximately 7:17pm, lonnie and i were taking pictures of the dallas skyline. to us, the sky was very clear and normal. when we got home and took a look at what we shot, the pictures revealed what the naked eye couldn't see. there are three shots taken with exactly 24 seconds between each. the first appears normal, the second you can clearly see three craft-like objects each with lights. the third shot the objects vanished, completely gone from the frame. it couldn't have been a plane. the nearest airport is ne, we were facing nw. and, that still doesn't explain the duration of the shots or the fact that the sky appeared completely clear of everything-objects and planes alike.
content.summary: Camera catches objects above dallas skyline

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting in my car with my daughter for her karate lesson to begin at 1730. around 1710 i was looking at the northern sky when what i thought at the time was a helicopter flying south bound and with a wobbling path at first then it straightened out and headed right at us. as it got closer to us i could see that it was not a helicopter and had a metallic surface.

 i started to point it out to my daughter and it stopped and seemed to hover and move eastward. my daughter spotted it and said maybe its a balloon, i said "no balloon moves at the rate of speed this thing was moving at us". i would say when it was traveling at us it was moving at the speed of a helicopter and about there flight path. then my daughters next words were it looks like a triangle and i said yeah it does! at this point it started to move westbound and climbing in altitude. i pulled out my i-phone and started to take pictures. in the pictures the shinny object is moving west.

 at 1715 the doors open for the karate lesson so i watched it as we walked in and five minutes later i returned alone to my car and the object was out of sight.

please see attached pictures.

thanks!
content.summary: What i thought was a helicopter turned out to be a shinny looking triangle

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was walking home and i seen 2 light changing orbs hovering there from where i was standing at my back porch.  i noticed it because i was watching the stars and thar one didn't look just like. my watch stopped for 3 minutes during this. i was pretty calm but stressed out.
content.summary: 2 orbs seen hovering

content.detailedDescription:
One evening in 1988 me and my brother were playing outside , i was on a skateboard while having a rope attached to my brother's bike so he could pull me forward. it being a bit late around 7 o clock it was twilight and i coincidently look up and saw a simular to the phoenix boomerang ufo (albeit much smaller in size) flying up only 1 meter above the rooftops of the houses. we were less then 20 yards away from it, in astonishment i shouted my brothers name and said "look!!!" , 

a boomerang shaped ufo, with lights surrounding its edges that were clearly turned off , the boomerang ufo was pitch black and it floated without making any noise in a straight line over the houses to the east over the city of volendam in the netherlands. me and my brother tried to chase it to no avail, the two of us running back in complete panic back to our parents house we slammed the front door open while screaming "ufo ufo ufo" my mother burst out in laughing she said " yeah right,you saw little green men with antenna's on their head didn't you? " , begging and pleading it was true what we saw, it's 2014 and she still doesn't believe us, after that time i shortly believed even my own mother was conspiring with the aliens to conceal their existence, luckely my father was showing more compassion by saying "well it could be that they saw something right?" 

just days after they broadcasted a ufo documentary on the television, i was terrified from watching that but none of the ufo's looked like the boomerang ufo me and my brother saw, months later i read about a boomerang ufo in a book only to be terrified and confirmed that what we saw was really real. 

many years later i was astonished by the phoenix light sighting once i saw about it, and the many simularities it had, except the size and the lights, the phoenix lights were gigantic and the lights were turned on, in our case it was in comparison a 10 yard small pitch black boomerang , the only reason i noticed it was because it was much darker then the twilight sky and caused a contrast as such, also unlike the phoenix ufo all of its lights were turned off. i really had the idea it was a sort of spy investigation ufo , i couldn't believe how advanced it was.
 
it was noiseless, i mean i first thought it was an american spy plane or something but that didn't make any sense since i live in western europe and americans nor the russians possesed that kind of technology (now that i think back about it, i actually was an avid military airplane picture collector as a kid) all the airplanes i know make noise,

 and in 1988 drone useage wasn't as extensive as it is now, and as far as i know most drones make noise, and it's design was so akward, none of it matched anything i've seen before, so i am better at sleeping then at drawing picture's but i'll try to give a basic picture of what i've seen.
content.summary: Phoenix boomerang drone ufo in holland.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside at about 2115 hrs as i usually do every night. i looked toward the florida mountains, five miles se of my trailer and saw a starlike object that seemed to be hovering over the right side of the mountain. the object appeared bluish white with green lights on the right exterior and a red light along the bottom/ these lights pulsated rhythmically and i saw a eam of light similar to a search light shine toward the ne a few times.

at first i thought it was possibly a border patrol helicopter, but it hovered for at least 30 minutes and is still there now.
content.summary: Over florida mountain range, object with different colored lights

content.detailedDescription:
I went out side to walk my dog last night around 11 pm. i look up as this huge orange translucent object is heading my way.All of a sudden i found that thousand of thoughts and emotions flooded my brain as i tried to make sense and justify what i was seeing. i could do nothing but yell out to my son to get out side. i was feeling frustrated that he was not coming fast enough to the point that he and his mother ran out to see if i was ok. when they looked up it was still very visible and they could not make sense of it either. my son pulled out his phone camera and could not get it to work. i grabbed it from him but my nerves had me fumbling with it as well. finally he snapped a picture as it was several miles away. this was not military as if it it were, they would not fly this over a populated area. it was not although it was the size of an airplane it could not be as it flew to slow and would fall out of the sky at that speed. it was not a helicopter as it was to big and did not make a sound as it passed by. as it flew toward me it appeared like a round to oval orange translucent object. as i caught the side view it looked more cylinder shape with several smaller orange objects in a straight line in tow.

file 1 is of the object as it faded away.
file 2 is not my picture it is what i found on the internet that resembles what we saw.
content.summary: I went out side to walk my dog last night around 11 pm. i look up as this huge orange translucent object is heading my way.
